name: Time Guardian (David Nikolovski)
description:
Time has been thrown out of sync by a thief stealing prominent historical artefacts and it is your job to get them back, restore the space time continuum, and save humanity.

Features:

  • 6 main levels.

  • 5 minigame types.

  • Custom controller support.

  • Tilt mechanic.

Controls: WASD to move character. Mouse to tilt the world. Spacebar and "E" keys for minigames, and interactions.
